## 2. Team Contracts (X-as-a-Service)

### Contract: {provider_team} → {consumer_team}

```yaml
contract:
  provider: "{provider_team}"
  consumer: "{consumer_team}"
  service: "{service_description}"
  interface: "{API_endpoint|documentation|self-service_portal}"
  sla:
    availability: "{uptime_percentage}"
    response_time: "{latency_target}"
    support_hours: "{hours}"
  versioning: "{how_changes_communicated}"
  escalation: "{what_happens_on_sla_violation}"
```

_(Repeat for each XaaS interaction)_

## 3. Coupling Analysis

| Team A | Team B | Temporal | Knowledge | Ownership | Overall | Action |
|--------|--------|----------|-----------|-----------|---------|--------|
| {team_a} | {team_b} | {L/M/H} | {L/M/H} | {L/M/H} | {L/M/H} | {keep/reduce} |

**Coupling Legend:**
- L (Low): Independent operation possible
- M (Medium): Some coordination needed
- H (High): Tightly coupled — risk of bottleneck

### Coupling Reduction Strategies

| Pair | Dimension | Current | Target | Strategy |
|------|-----------|---------|--------|----------|
| {pair} | {temporal/knowledge/ownership} | HIGH | MEDIUM | {strategy} |

## 4. Communication Protocols

### Collaboration Mode

| Element | Protocol |
|---------|----------|
| Channel | Shared Slack channel for duration |
| Cadence | Daily standup (15 min max) |
| Planning | Joint sprint planning |
| Tracking | Shared board |
| Duration | {weeks} weeks, ends {date} |

### X-as-a-Service Mode

| Element | Protocol |
|---------|----------|
| Documentation | Self-service API docs |
| Support | Ticket system |
| Review | Quarterly review meeting |
| Changes | Changelog notifications |

### Facilitation Mode

| Element | Protocol |
|---------|----------|
| Sessions | Weekly coaching (1h) |
| Resources | Shared learning materials |
| Progress | Monthly review |
| Exit | {exit_criteria} by {date} |
